name: Battle of the Lexicon Lords
summary: In Battle of the Lexicon Lords, players embark on a journey to defeat powerful Lexicon Lords who have taken over the realms with their mastery of words. Each Lord has a unique word as their "Keyword," representing their essence and power. Players must decipher this Keyword through a series of word puzzles akin to the popular NY Times word game to weaken the Lexicon Lord before engaging in battle!
